5.text: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, Thubal, Mosoch, Thiras.

6.text: And the sons of Gomer: Ascenez, and Riphath, and Thogorma.

7.text: And the sons of Javan: Elisa and Tharsis, Cethim and Dodanim.

8.text: The sons of Cham: Chus, and Mesrai, and Phut, and Chaanan.

9.text: And the sons of Chus: Saba, and Hevila, Sabatha, and Regma, and Sabathaca. And the sons of Regma: Saba, and Dadan.

10.text: Now Chus begot Nemrod: he began to be mighty upon earth.

11.text: But Mesraim begot Ludim, and Anamim, and Laabim, and Nephtuim,

12.text: Phetrusim also, and Casluim: from whom came the Philistines, and Caphtorim.

13.text: And Chanaan beget Sidon his firstborn, and the Hethite,

14.text: And the Jebusite, and the Amorrhite, and the Gergesite,

15.text: And the Hevite, and the Aracite, and the Sinite,

16.text: And the Aradian, and the Samarite, and the Hamathite.

17.text: The sons of Sem: Elam and Asur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Hus, and Hul, and Gether, and Mosoch.

18.text: And Arphaxad beget Sale, and Sale beget Heber.

19.text: And to Heber were born two sons, the name of the one was Phaleg, because In his days the earth was divided; and the name of his brother was Jectan.

20.text: And Jectan beget Elmodad, and Saleph, and Asarmoth, and Jare,

21.text: And Adoram, and Usal, and Decla,

22.text: And Hebal, and Abimael, and Saba,

23.text: And Ophir, and Hevila, and Jobab. All these are the sons of Jectan.

28.text: And the sons of Abraham, Isaac and Ismahel.

29.text: And these are the generations of them. The firstborn of Ismahel, Nabajoth, then Cedar, and Adbeel, and Mabsam,

30.text: And Masma, and Duma, Massa, Hadad, and Thema,

31.text: Jetur, Naphis, Cedma: these are the sons of Ismahel.

32.text: And the sons of Cetura, Abrahamâ€™s concubine, whom she bore: Zamran, Jecsan, Madan, Madian, Jesboc, and Sue. And the sons of Jecsan, Saba, and Dadan. And the sons of Dadan: Assurim, and Latussim, and Laomin.

33.text: And the sons of Madian: Epha, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaa. All these are the sons of Cetura.

34.text: And Abraham beget Isaac: and his sons were Esau and Israel.

35.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Rahuel, Jehus, Ihelom, and Core.

36.text: The sons of Eliphaz: Theman, Omar, Sephi, Gathan, Cenez, and by Thamna, Amalec.

37.text: The sons of Rahuel: Nahath, Zara, Samma, Meza.

38.text: The sons of Seir: Lotan. Sobal, Sebeen, Ana, Dison, Eser, Disan.

39.text: The sons of Lotan: Hori, Homam. And the sister of Lotan was Thamna.

40.text: The sons of Sobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Sephi and Onam. The sons of Sebeon: Aia, and Ana. The son of Ana: Dison.

41.text: The sons of Dison: Hamram, and Eseban, and Jethran, and Charan.

42.text: The sons of Eser: Balaan, and Zavan, and Jacan. The sons of Disan: Hus and Aran.

43.text: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom, before there was a king over the children of Israel: Bale the son of Beer: and the name of his city was Denaba.

44.text: And Bale died, and Jobab the son of Zare of Bosra, reigned in his stead.

45.text: And when Jobab also was dead, Husam of the land of the Themanites reigned in his stead.

46.text: And Husam also died, and Adad the son of Badad reigned in his stead, and he defeated the Madianites in the land of Moab: and the name of his city was Avith.

47.text: And when Adad also was dead, Semla of Masreca reigned in his stead.

48.text: Semla also died, and Saul of Rohoboth, which is near the river, reigned in his stead.

49.text: And when Saul was dead, Balanan the son of Achobor reigned in his stead.

50.text: He also died, and Adad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Phau, and his wife was called Meetabel the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezaab.

51.text: And after the death of Adad, there began to be dukes in Edom instead of kings: duke Thamna, duke Alva, duke Jetheth,

52.text: Duke Oolibama, duke Ela, duke Phinon,

54.text: Duke Magdiel, duke Hiram. These are the dukes of Edom.
